response.overview: At exactly 12:00 AM, four students mysteriously vanish from their school without a single trace. Whispers spread that they were attempting a viral midnight ritual circulating online. Days later, the police recover a shattered camera containing footage recordings that may reveal what truly happened that nightâ€¦ and what they might have awakened.
response.tagline: No mercy. No escape. No one gets out alive.
response.title: Sangkar
